author: sscruz
body:
#### PR description:
Addition of the low pt muon MVA
Weights are included in https://github.com/cms-data/RecoMuon-MuonIdentification/pull/5
Details can be found in: https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSMUONS-158
This PR is being built on top of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26413

#### PR validation:
PR has been tested with workflow 136.863
title: Adding low pt muon mva (muon POG)
